item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Hot Club - on S. Water St. (this is the area with a few bars across from Narragansett Electric and in front of the hurricane barrier on the water.)

THE HOT CLUB AND PRONK! 2012 !!!

So, it's a holiday for some, but not for most, AND it's also the PRONK Festival at India Point Park. Well now, how can we combine all these festivities?! By attending it all, of course! So this is the plan:

Below is the PRONK! 2012 schedule of events. It begins at 3pm, so check it out, attend and see what all the fuss is about.....

NOTICE that the festivities will be moving parade-style down Wickenden Street at 5pm over to the S. Water Street area and next to the Hot Club by 6pm, where they will play on two stages until 10:30pm.

If you only have a chance to see them after work, then this is a PERFECT opportunity for us to catch a little of the festival AND enjoy the Providence waterfront at the Hot Club for the Monday Night Meetup!

So, whether you go to PRONK, or go to work this Monday, stop in and enjoy the end of this long weekend by winding down and hanging out with friends on the deck of the Hot Club overlooking the water and the Providence skyline!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

Bring a friend! Hope to see you there!

PRONK! 2012 Schedule:

This year's Providence HONK Festival is bigger and louder than ever. Be regaled by music from 14 street bands from around the country and across the globe - over 200 musicians!

Schedule (stay tuned for updates):
3pm - 5pm - Performances in India Point Park
5:30 - Parade down Wickenden Street

6:00 - Special surprise when parade ends down at South Water Street (next to the Hot Club)
6:30 - 10:30 - Showcase performances on the Providence River (2 stages!)

Bands include:

2012 Bands

Carnival Band (Vancouver, BC) http://www.carnivalband.com/

Chaotic Noise Marching Corps (Seattle, WA)
https://www.facebook.com/ChaoticNoiseMarchingCorps

Detroit Party Marching Band (Detroit, MI)
https://www.facebook.com/DetroitPartyMarchingBand

Dirty Water Brass Band (Somerville, MA)
http://www.myspace.com/dirtywaterbrassband

Environmental Encroachment (Chicago, IL)
http://www.encroach.net/

Emperor Norton’s Stationary Marching Band (Somerville, MA)
http://www.ensmb.com/

Extraordinary Rendition Band (Providence)
http://extraordinaryrenditionband.com/

The Kickin Brass Band (RI)
https://www.facebook.com/kickinbrassband?v=info

Loyd Family Players (Oakland, CA)
http://www.theloydfamilyplayers.com/

Lungs Face Feet (Pittsburgh, PA)
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Lungs-Face-Feet/178045782211447

Minor Mishap (Austin, TX)
http://www.myspace.com/mmmarchingband

Pink Puffers (Rome, Italy)
http://www.pinkpuffers.com/Pink/PinkPuffers.html

What Cheer? Brigade (Providence, RI)
http://www.whatcheerbrigade.com/

Young Fellaz (New Orleans, LA)
https://www.facebook.com/youngfellazbrassband
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing the brown and pink scarf in my picture and will be there a little early!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Hot Club & PRONK! 2012!!!
